description.narrative: Funding under this initiative represents Australia's contribution to the United Nations Development Program (UNDP) administered One Programme" account. Funds will be used to strengthen the Government of Pakistan's (GoP) capacity to conduct an accurate housing and population census in 2009. The activity will be administered by UNDP and coordinated by United nations Population Fund (UNFPA). The 2009 census will be the largest and most significant statistical exercise ever undertaken in the country and will provide GoP and development partners with detailed demographic data at the province, district and village levels. The provision of this information and data is critical to planning for development programs in Pakistan. The total value of this initiative is $1.0 million over 2 years, starting 2008-09.
